name: Anthony WALLACE, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Wallace v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation Parole

parties: Anthony WALLACE, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 12th day of July, 2004. Probable jurisdiction is noted and the order appealed is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
857 A.2d 181
Anthony WALLACE, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION PAROLE, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 12, 2004.
